00037 #ifndef EGS_PROJECTORS_
00038 #define EGS_PROJECTORS_
00039 
00040 #include "egs_vector.h"
00041 #include "egs_math.h"
00042 
00043 #include <string>
00044 using namespace std;
00045 
00054 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_2DVector {
00055 public:
00056     EGS_Float x, y;
00057     EGS_2DVector() : x(0), y(0) {};
00058     EGS_2DVector(EGS_Float X, EGS_Float Y) : x(X), y(Y) {};
00059     EGS_2DVector(const EGS_2DVector &v) : x(v.x), y(v.y) {};
00060     EGS_2DVector &operator=(const EGS_Vector &v) {
00061         x = v.x; y = v.y; return *this;
00062     };
00063     EGS_2DVector operator+(const EGS_2DVector &v) const {
00064         return EGS_2DVector(x+v.x, y+v.y);
00065     };
00066     EGS_2DVector &operator+=(const EGS_2DVector &v) {
00067         x += v.x; y += v.y; return *this;
00068     };
00069     EGS_2DVector operator-(const EGS_2DVector &v) const {
00070         return EGS_2DVector(x-v.x, y-v.y);
00071     };
00072     EGS_2DVector &operator-=(const EGS_2DVector &v) {
00073         x -= v.x; y -= v.y; return *this;
00074     };
00075     EGS_2DVector operator*(const EGS_Float f) const {
00076         return EGS_2DVector(x*f,y*f);
00077     };
00078     EGS_2DVector &operator*=(const EGS_Float f) {
00079         x*=f; y*=f; return *this;
00080     };
00081     EGS_Float operator*(const EGS_2DVector &v) const { return x*v.x + y*v.y; };
00082     EGS_Float operator%(const EGS_2DVector &v) const {
00083         return x*v.y - y*v.x;
00084     };
00085     EGS_Vector crossProduct(const EGS_2DVector &v) const {
00086         return EGS_Vector(0,0,x*v.y - y*v.x);
00087     };
00088     EGS_Float length() const { return sqrt(x*x+y*y); };
00089     EGS_Float length2() const { return x*x+y*y; };
00090     void normalize() { EGS_Float tmp=1./length(); x*=tmp; y*=tmp; };
00091 };

00101 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_XProjector {
00102 public:
00103     EGS_XProjector(const string &Type) : type(Type) {};
00104     EGS_Float operator*(const EGS_Vector &x) const { return x.x; };
00105     EGS_Vector operator*(EGS_Float t) const { return EGS_Vector(t,0,0); };
00106     EGS_Float length() const { return 1; };
00107     EGS_2DVector getProjection(const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00108         return EGS_2DVector(x.y,x.z);
00109     };
00110     EGS_Float distance(const EGS_Vector &x) const { return x.x; }
00111     const string &getType() const { return type; };
00112     void printInfo() const {};
00113     EGS_Vector normal() const { return EGS_Vector(1,0,0); };
00114     EGS_Vector normal(const EGS_2DVector &x) const {
00115         return EGS_Vector(0,x.x,x.y);
00116     };
00117     EGS_Vector getPoint(const EGS_2DVector &x) const { return normal(x); };
00118 private:
00119     string type;
00120 };
00121 
00129 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_YProjector {
00130 public:
00131     EGS_YProjector(const string &Type) : type(Type) {};
00132     EGS_Float operator*(const EGS_Vector &x) const { return x.y; };
00133     EGS_Vector operator*(EGS_Float t) const { return EGS_Vector(0,t,0); };
00134     EGS_Float length() const { return 1; };
00135     EGS_2DVector getProjection(const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00136         return EGS_2DVector(x.x,x.z);
00137     };
00138     EGS_Float distance(const EGS_Vector &x) const { return x.y; }
00139     const string &getType() const { return type; };
00140     void printInfo() const {};
00141     EGS_Vector normal() const { return EGS_Vector(0,1,0); };
00142     EGS_Vector normal(const EGS_2DVector &x) const {
00143         return EGS_Vector(x.x,0,x.y);
00144     };
00145     EGS_Vector getPoint(const EGS_2DVector &x) const { return normal(x); };
00146 private:
00147     string type;
00148 };

00157 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_ZProjector {
00158 public:
00159     EGS_ZProjector(const string &Type) : type(Type) {};
00160     EGS_Float operator*(const EGS_Vector &x) const { return x.z; };
00161     EGS_Vector operator*(EGS_Float t) const { return EGS_Vector(0,0,t); };
00162     EGS_Float length() const { return 1; };
00163     EGS_2DVector getProjection(const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00164         return EGS_2DVector(x.x,x.y);
00165     };
00166     EGS_Float distance(const EGS_Vector &x) const { return x.z; }
00167     const string &getType() const { return type; };
00168     void printInfo() const {};
00169     EGS_Vector normal() const { return EGS_Vector(0,0,1); };
00170     EGS_Vector normal(const EGS_2DVector &x) const {
00171         return EGS_Vector(x.x,x.y,0);
00172     };
00173     EGS_Vector getPoint(const EGS_2DVector &x) const { return normal(x); };
00174 private:
00175     string type;
00176 };

00182 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_Projector {
00183 public:
00186     EGS_Projector(const EGS_Vector &A, const string &Type);
00187 
00190     EGS_Projector(const EGS_Vector &x1, const EGS_Vector &x2,
00191                   const EGS_Vector &x3, const string &Type);
00192 
00194     EGS_Float operator*(const EGS_Vector &x) const { return a*x; };
00195 
00197     EGS_Vector operator*(EGS_Float t) const { return a*t; };
00198 
00200     EGS_Float length() const { return norm; };
00201 
00203     EGS_2DVector getProjection(const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00204         return EGS_2DVector((x-xo)*v1,(x-xo)*v2);
00205     };
00206 
00209     EGS_Float distance(const EGS_Vector &x) const { return x*a-d; }
00210 
00212     const string &getType() const { return type; };
00213 
00215     void printInfo() const;
00216 
00218     EGS_Vector normal() const { return a; };
00219 
00221     EGS_Vector normal(const EGS_2DVector &x) const {
00222         return v1*x.x + v2*x.y;
00223     };
00224 
00226     EGS_Vector getPoint(const EGS_2DVector &x) const {
00227         return xo + v1*x.x + v2*x.y;
00228     };
00229 private:
00230     EGS_Vector a;         
00231     EGS_Vector xo;        
00232     EGS_Vector v1,v2;     
00234     EGS_Float  norm;      
00235     EGS_Float  d;         
00236     string type;          
00237 };
